Text: Please keep me in mindpst Hi Louise I know things are tough in all areas and this is a difficult time for everyone I just wanted to let you know that I dont know what my destiny will be around here especially since we are shutting Broadband down and I have not received any word if I will be part of the work out team If you know of anything that might be fit for me either for the short term or the longer please keep me in mind Best regards good luck Arshak
Akamai UUNETAndy We need to continue our effort on this Let me know if you had a chance to read the emails I forwarded to you covering the negotiations regarding the contracts Regards Arshak
